channel.title: Moonlight News Feed
channel.description: News and Information from The Moonlight Grid

item.title: Chugga Chugga
item.description:
We're chugging along

Kind of feels like a yo yo roller coaster ride. We've built quite a nice world. Just we have no good place to host it. We're limping along so we do have somewhat of a presence on the net. Just not up to full speed. Donations are always welcomed!

item.title: Back In The Saddle Again!
item.description:
Weeee're Baaaack!

After some downtime we were able to sort out the tech issues, mostly. Performance is a bit degraded while we run on backup servers. Hopefully that will be remedied in the coming weeks

item.title: All New Design!
item.description: With the help and contribution of Vinhold Starbrook, The Moonlight Grid Website has a whole new design. We also have new functionality as well! No longer are new Avatars logged in as a cloud!

item.title: Sonja's Slice
item.description: Ever wanted to know what goes on behind the the minds or at least desks of the developers? Check out Sonja's Slice of the Grid for tidbits from the Discover Creo Mundos, SecondLife, Moonlight Grid and OpenSim grids.
item.author: sonja.galileo@moonlight-grid.com

item.title: Website Additions
item.description: The Moonlight Grid Website is coming along. We've added a login page that brings you to a couple of other pages. We're still under construction so the content is pretty light. But stay tuned!
item.author: sonja@moonlight-grid.com

item.title: Join In On The Fun!
item.description: Now you can join us on the Moonlight Grid. Visit the New Create An Avatar Account page now.
item.author: sonja@moonlight-grid.com

item.title: The Moonlight Grid Goes Live!
item.description: The Moonlight Grid moves to a powerful new server and goes live!
